reviews.review_msg: Great teacher! makes the material exciting. She's very helpful and knowledgeable. It's a highly theoretical course. Be wary though, her marking is tough, but also fair. I hope SFU recruits more teachers like her.

This class was amazing! If you genuinely are interested in power dynamics within society, you'll love this course! Helen is a fantastic prof! She's pretty easy and very open to other ideas. I'll be sure to take other classes with her! Just be sure to participate!
Great teacher. Really knows his material. Better off doing the readings AFTER lecture tho- if he doesn't talk about it ..dont bother reading it cuz u wont be tested on it
